TUTORIAL WALLS
-
you need to get the balloon out from the top right corner
-
balloon 123.000000 300.000000 -1 -1 -1
brickWall 558.000000 80.000000 5 2 0
brickWall 16.000000 81.000000 5 2 0
brickWall 16.000000 196.000000 5 2 0
brickWall 17.000000 303.000000 4 2 0

brickWall 558.000000 289.000000 4 2 0
brickWall 528.000000 350.000000 3 0 0

baseBall 116.000000 136.000000 -1 -1 -1
basketBall 216.000000 107.000000 -1 -1 -1
basketBall 375.000000 45.999985 -1 -1 -1

TUTORIAL ENGINES
-
you need to get the balls in the boxes (tip: use the engines)
-
baseBall 64.000000 213.000000 -1 -1 -1
baseBall 286.000000 218.000000 -1 -1 -1
basketBall 413.000000 24.000000 -1 -1 -1
brickWall 73.000000 157.000000 1 0 -1

TUTORIAL TRAMPOLINE
-
get the ball to in between the pipes
-
baseBall 89.000000 250.000015 -1 -1 -1
brickWall 64.000000 269.000000 1 0 -1
trampoline 108.000000 320.000000 -1 -1 -1
trampoline 212.000000 283.000000 -1 -1 -1
trampoline 334.000000 242.000000 -1 -1 -1
trampoline 458.000000 196.000000 -1 -1 -1
pipeWall 515.000000 251.000000 3 2 -1
pipeWall 552.000000 251.000000 3 2 -1
pipeWall 535.000000 299.000000 1 0 -1
-
trampoline 3
-
0 25 15 525 280
-
-

TUTORIAL BALLOON
-
get the balloon to explode!
-
balloon 296.000000 326.000000 -1 -1 -1
mouseEngine 72.000000 161.000000 -1 -1 -1
basketBall 72.000000 106.000000 -1 -1 -1
scissors 393.000000 121.999992 -1 -1 -1
-
belt 1
basketBall 1
brickWall 1
conveyor 1
-
-
0
-

UP THE HILL
-
make the mice sweat!
-
mouseEngine 479.000000 211.000000 -1 -1 -1
mouseEngine 42.000000 310.000000 -1 -1 -1
baseBall 69.000000 249.000000 -1 -1 -1
fancyWall 172.000000 305.000000 1 3 -1
fancyWall 372.000000 246.000000 5 3 -1
-
conveyor 2
mouseEngine 1
belt 2
-
-
0

ITZHAK'S NIGHTMARE
-
get both balloons to explode, this one is kinda hard, good luck!
-
balloon 481.000000 335.000000 -1 -1 -1
balloon 480.000000 288.000000 -1 -1 -1
mouseEngine 61.000000 152.000000 -1 -1 -1
baseBall 192.000000 177.000000 -1 -1 -1
conveyor 209.000000 194.000000 -1 -1 -1
mouseEngine 99.000000 184.000000 -1 -1 -1
scissors 535.000000 101.000000 -1 -1 -1
scissors 535.000000 50.000000 -1 -1 -1
-
conveyor 1
basketBall 1
belt 2
baseBall 1
